title: Screen Freezing In-Game
body: Is anyone else having problems with the screen In-Game freezing for 2-3 seconds periodically? This only started when the newest patch came out and it has caused me many deaths. I tried messing around with video settings thinking that maybe it was a particles or resolution issue. Nothing I do changes when the screen freezes.

replies.body: Is it the actual screen as in you can't move the camera around or mouse until the freeze passes, or is it more like all characters in the match freeze and then suddenly catch up?

> [{quoted}](name=asciK,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VwNAEwdc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-08T05:04:06.161+0000)
>
> [Yup. Same here...](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fYr4sYvF-riot-again-edit) Its super annoying!!

I saw your post and now have task manager pulled up so I can watch the processes next time I play.
